Name: production-report
Label: Production Report

Components.Label: Group
Components.Query:
[
    {
        "Id": "ds.TypeId, sm.VendorId, sm.AgentId, ds.SaleId, ds.InsertedBy, ds.PolId, ds.PodId, ds.ParentId, ds.CustomerId",
        "Name": "General",
        "GroupBy": "TypeId",
        "GroupFormat": "this.Entity.Type.Name",
        "OrderBy": "ds.TypeId asc, ds.ParentId asc"
    },
    {
        "Id": "ds.TypeId, ds.SaleId, ds.PolId, ds.PodId, ds.ParentId",
        "Name": "Salesman",
        "GroupBy": "SaleId",
        "GroupFormat": "this.Entity.Sale.FullName",
        "OrderBy": "ds.SaleId asc,ds.TypeId asc, ds.ParentId asc"
    },
    {
        "Id": "ds.TypeId, ds.PolId, ds.PodId, ds.ParentId, ds.CustomerId",
        "Name": "Customers",
        "GroupBy": "CustomerId",
        "GroupFormat": "this.Entity.Customer.Name",
        "OrderBy": "ds.CustomerId asc,ds.TypeId asc, ds.ParentId asc"
    },
    {
        "Id": "ds.TypeId, sm.AgentId, ds.PolId, ds.PodId, ds.ParentId",
        "Name": "Agent",
        "GroupBy": "AgentId",
        "GroupFormat": "this.Entity.Agent.Name",
        "OrderBy": "sm.AgentId asc,ds.TypeId asc, ds.ParentId asc"
    },
    {
        "Id": "ds.TypeId, sm.VendorId, ds.PolId, ds.PodId, ds.ParentId",
        "Name": "Provider",
        "GroupBy": "VendorId",
        "GroupFormat": "this.Entity.Vendor.Name",
        "OrderBy": "sm.VendorId asc,ds.TypeId asc, ds.ParentId asc"
    },
    {
        "Id": "ds.TypeId, ds.InsertedBy, ds.PolId, ds.PodId, ds.ParentId",
        "Name": "Creator",
        "GroupBy": "InsertedBy",
        "GroupFormat": "this.Entity.InsertedByMasterData.FullName",
        "OrderBy": "ds.InsertedBy asc,ds.TypeId asc, ds.ParentId asc"
    }
]

Components.Label: HBL Type
Service
ShipmentFee
Components.Query:
{
    "sql": "DECLARE @cols NVARCHAR(MAX), @query NVARCHAR(MAX);
SELECT @cols = STRING_AGG(QUOTENAME(Id), ',')
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT ds.Id 
    FROM MasterData ds 
    JOIN MasterData m2 ON ds.ParentId = m2.Id 
    WHERE m2.Name = 'Container Type'
) AS tmp;
SET @cols = ISNULL(@cols, '[NoData]');
SET @query = '
WITH ShipmentData AS (
    SELECT 
           NEWID() as Id,
           {Group},
           COUNT(ds.Id) AS QuantityHBL,
           SUM(ISNULL(ds.GW,0)) AS GW,
           SUM(ISNULL(ds.CW,0)) AS CW,
           SUM(ISNULL(ds.Teus,0)) AS Teus
    FROM Shipment AS ds
    JOIN Shipment sm ON ds.ParentId = sm.Id
    WHERE ds.ParentId IS NOT NULL
    AND ds.{DateFieldId} >= @FromDate AND ds.{DateFieldId} < @ToDate
    AND sm.IsComplete IN ({Complete})
    AND (@VendorIds = ''''
    OR sm.VendorId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT(@VendorIds, '',''))
    OR sm.AgentId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT(@VendorIds, '',''))
    OR ds.CustomerId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT(@VendorIds, '','')))
    AND (@SaleIds = '''' OR ds.SaleId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT(@SaleIds, '','')))
    AND (@InsertedByIds = '''' OR ds.InsertedBy IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT(@InsertedByIds, '','')))
    AND (@ShipperIds = '''' OR ds.ShipperId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT(@ShipperIds, '','')))
    AND (@ConsigneeIds = '''' OR ds.ConsigneeId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT(@ConsigneeIds, '','')))
    AND (@PolIds = '''' OR ds.PolId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT(@PolIds, '','')))
    AND (@PodIds = '''' OR ds.PodId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT(@PodIds, '','')))
    AND (@TypeIds = '''' OR ds.TypeId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT(@TypeIds, '','')))
    GROUP BY {Group}
    order by {OrderBy}
    OFFSET {Skip} ROWS
    FETCH NEXT {Top} ROWS ONLY
)
SELECT s.*, ' + @cols + '
FROM ShipmentData s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT ParentId as Shipment, ' + @cols + ' FROM (
        SELECT s1.ParentId, e.ContainerTypeId, ISNULL(e.Quantity, 0) AS Quantity 
        FROM EntityContainer e
        JOIN Shipment s1 ON e.EntityId = s1.Id
        WHERE s1.ParentId IS NOT NULL
    ) AS SourceTable
    PIVOT (
        SUM(Quantity)
        FOR ContainerTypeId IN (' + @cols + ')
    ) AS PivotTable
) ec ON s.ParentId = ec.Shipment;
';

IF @cols <> '[NoData]'
    EXEC sp_executesql @query, 
        N'@FromDate nvarchar(200), @ToDate nvarchar(200), @VendorIds NVARCHAR(MAX), @SaleIds NVARCHAR(MAX), @PolIds NVARCHAR(MAX), @PodIds NVARCHAR(MAX), @InsertedByIds NVARCHAR(MAX), @ShipperIds NVARCHAR(MAX), @ConsigneeIds NVARCHAR(MAX), @TypeIds NVARCHAR(MAX)', 
        '{FromDate}', '{ToDate}', '{VendorIds}', '{SaleIds}', '{PolIds}', '{PodIds}', '{InsertedByIds}', '{ShipperIds}', '{ConsigneeIds}', '{TypeIds}';
ELSE
    PRINT 'Không có dữ liệu để tạo PIVOT.';",
    "total": "select count(*) as total
	from (
	select count(ds.Id) as total 
    from Shipment as ds 
    join Shipment sm on ds.ParentId = sm.Id
    WHERE ds.ParentId IS NOT NULL
    AND ds.{DateFieldId} >= '{FromDate}' AND ds.{DateFieldId} < '{ToDate}'
    AND sm.IsComplete IN ({Complete})
    AND ('{VendorIds}' = ''
    OR sm.VendorId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{VendorIds}', ','))
    OR sm.AgentId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{VendorIds}', ','))
    OR ds.CustomerId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{VendorIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{InsertedByIds}' = '' OR ds.InsertedBy IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{InsertedByIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{ShipperIds}' = '' OR ds.ShipperId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{ShipperIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{ConsigneeIds}' = '' OR ds.ConsigneeId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{ConsigneeIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{SaleIds}' = '' OR ds.SaleId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{SaleIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{PolIds}' = '' OR ds.PolId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{PolIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{PodIds}' = '' OR ds.PodId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{PodIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{TypeIds}' = '' OR ds.TypeId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{TypeIds}', ',')))
    group by {Group}) as ds"
}
Components.PreQuery:
{
    "FromDate": this.EditForm.Entity.FromDate ? this.dayjs(this.EditForm.Entity.FromDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD') : '',
    "ToDate": this.EditForm.Entity.ToDate ? this.dayjs(this.EditForm.Entity.ToDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD') : '',
    "DateFieldId": this.EditForm.Entity.DateFieldId ? this.EditForm.Entity.DateFieldId : 'ShipmentDate',
    "Complete": this.EditForm.Entity.Complete || "0,1",
    "Group": this.EditForm.Entity.GroupId || "ds.TypeId, sm.VendorId, sm.AgentId, ds.SaleId, ds.InsertedBy, ds.PolId, ds.PodId, ds.ParentId, ds.CustomerId",
    "OrderBy": this.EditForm.Entity.Group ? this.EditForm.Entity.Group.OrderBy : "ds.TypeId asc,ds.ParentId asc",
    "SaleIds": this.EditForm.Entity.SaleIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.SaleIds : "",
    "VendorIds": this.EditForm.Entity.VendorIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.VendorIds : "",
    "InsertedByIds": this.EditForm.Entity.InsertedByIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.InsertedByIds : "",
    "ConsigneeIds": this.EditForm.Entity.ConsigneeIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.ConsigneeIds : "",
    "ShipperIds": this.EditForm.Entity.ShipperIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.ShipperIds : "",
    "ServiceIds": this.EditForm.Entity.ServiceIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.ServiceIds : "",
    "TypeIds": this.EditForm.Entity.TypeIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.TypeIds : "",
    "PolIds": this.EditForm.Entity.PolIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.PolIds : "",
    "PodIds": this.EditForm.Entity.PodIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.PodIds : ""
}

GridPolicies.Query:
select * 
from MasterData as ds 
where ds.ParentId = '00a10160-0000-0000-8000-117700e7cf7e' and Active = 1 
order by Code asc
